subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Statistically, Brian Hoyer has been less impressive than Johnny Manziel during two preseason games, but Hoyer has five years of N.F.L. experience with three different teams.
snippet: Statistically, Brian Hoyer has been less impressive than Johnny Manziel during two preseason games, but Hoyer has five years of N.F.L. experience with three different teams.
